Description: Fragment of rim and bowl of East Greek pottery plate or shallow dish. Exterior reserved with two bands on wall. Lip and interior slipped cream; bars on outside of lip, alternating black and white rectangles on top; dotted cross in white on preserved black rectangle; on outside of bowl black band with added red band lined in white; to the centre, frieze of lotus and palmette; added red on alternate palmette leaves.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.494)
